title: Cercle Story: Chapter Two (melodic mix)
description:
Cercle Story is a unique project made for the dreamers... A film featuring 9 amazing artists, from 9 stunning locations with the idea of recreating a full day from sunrise to sunset around the world. 

0.0.3.0 | HALO is OUT! 💥
Vinyl available in limited edition on http://shop.cercle.io/

☞ Support us and get access to exclusive videos & perks: https://Cercle.lnk.to/Patreon
☞ Listen to our playlists, tracks & sets: https://Cercle.lnk.to/Playlists
☞ Subscribe to our newsletter to know about our next shows: https://Cercle.lnk.to/Members
☞ Subscribe to our YouTube channel: https://Cercle.lnk.to/ytcercle

☞ Cercle Story: Chapter One
https://youtu.be/3lTUAWOgoHs
